channel.title: ::task commmand 317 Acheron
channel.description: i would really appreciate it if someone could give me the code for task command. if someone doesnt know what this is. its when you get a slayer task and all you have to do is do ::task and it takes you to your task

item.title: ::task commmand 317 Acheron
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

We’re here to help, not do-for.
You’d have to have an entire location system for all your slayer npcs, and from there you’d have to call them in the command and then teleport the player from that data.

Read full topic
